name: AddCandidateToProject
description:
Add a candidate to a specified project.

Use this tool to assign a candidate to a specific project. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: candidate_project_assignment_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'candidateId' and 'projectId' to specify which candidate is added to which project.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
